translation.en: I went dancing and everything. Can I try them out?

translation.en: -Where're you gonna go? -[laughing]
Sorry!
[laughing] Hello!
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Hey!
-Whoa, whoa, whoa. [laughing] -Nurse! Nurse!
-Somebody call security! -Security!
So what did they do?
They fired my ass. What do you think they did?

translation.en: -Oh, Beverly! -[Bev] I was sick of that place anyway.
Gainful employment was cramping her style.

You could lose your fucking license.
What are you doing?
[Bev] I got a headache. I need a--
[Mamaw] You can't have a goddamn hissy every time you have an off day.

translation.en: You gotta think about these kids.
What do you think I've been thinking about since I was 18 years old, huh?

translation.en: Never had a life where I wasn't thinking about the kids.

translation.en: It's all about us.
-[Mamaw] So what are you gonna do? -Figure something out.
Great plan, Mom.
It isn't easy, all right? Just wait till you get pregnant.

translation.en: I'm not having a kid.
You think you're special? That's what happens to girls.

translation.en: Only girls that are stupid.
-Beverly! -[Bev] You wanna call me stupid?
-Little bitch! -[Lindsay] I'm going to Kevin's!
[Bev] It's easy when someone else is paying the bills!

translation.en: -[Lindsay] I'm smarter than you! -[Bev] You gotta respect your mother!
translation.de: -Ich bin schlauer als du! -Ich verlange Respekt!

translation.en: Can I put on Meet the Press? There's a special about Monica Lewinsky.

translation.en: [sniffles] I don't want to hear any more of that filth.

translation.en: -What's the name of this game? -Son of a bitch!
[chuckles] Watch your mouth. Gin.
-[Mamaw chuckles] -I never win.
Well, if you don't like it, find some lame-ass loser to play with.

translation.en: Deal.
-[Mamaw] Oh, my God. -Shit!
You are the worst fucking card player I ever met.

translation.en: -How many times you've seen this movie? -Oh, about a hundred.

Like it, I figure.
Everyone in this world is one of three kinds:

translation.de: den guten Terminator, den bösen und den neutralen.

Well, wasn't always. I had to learn.

translation.en: You could be, too, if you don't fuck it up.

Is Mom like you?
She and Papaw were more the same.
He was a good Terminator.
[sighs] At times, he could be the bad one.

He let things get to him, make him feel small.

-Ugh. One of them crazies down the street. -[people screaming]
[Mamaw] It's always something.
[Lindsay] Somebody get help!
[man 1] We need help! Someone call 911!

-[man 2] Ma'am, get out of the road! -Help me!

[Bev] No!

[sobbing] Mom, please…
[officer 1] Stand back! Calm down, we just need you to breathe.

Stand back!
[Bev screaming] No! No! No!
-[Mamaw] J.D.! -[Bev] No!
Don't look at that! Come on! Don't you look at…

You look at me! All right?
Lindsay, honey! Come back down to my house!

translation.en: -[officer 2] You need to calm down. -No!
-[officer 1] Calm down! -[Lindsay] Help her!
Yes, I'm looking for a bed for my mother.

No? Okay. Thanks.
Shit.
[J.D.] Please don't put me on hold.
Oh, my God. Is that a fried baloney sandwich?
-[chuckles] -My savior.
-[laughing] -Come on, Linds. Seriously. I need this.

There they are. Oh, look at you, huh?
Keep it down! He's talking to Yale! Ooh!
I ain't seen you since your Mamaw's funeral.

-Was she a holy terror. -Yeah. [chuckles]
-You got the beer. -Yes, I do.
[Lindsay] Did you get the buns?
Uh… I…
Well, enjoy your bunless dogs then.

Taking care of my mother, dealing with all that.

-Cedar Creek? Food's shit. -[Louis] My brother-in-law was there.

Get her into Fairlawn. It's like a resort.

Doesn't your friend Sally work over at that rehab…

Hell no. You kidding me? You blindfold her?

Anything?
I'm still on hold. It's unbelievable.

-Don't be an asshole. Let her decide. -[scoffs]

translation.en: Damn.
But Parker has taken it a step further

translation.en: -to say judges are inherently political… -[cell phone vibrates] …which isn't necessarily true.

translation.en: -Be right back. -Usha's right.
-Hey. -[J.D.] Hey.
-Did you make it home all right? -Yeah, sorry I didn't call sooner.
I've just been dealing with all this stuff.

but the hospital's kicking her out at 3:00 p.m.

-…tomorrow at 10:00 a.m. -That's incredible, J.D.
Yeah, if I can make it.
Listen. Let me come.
I can stay with your mom and you come back and interview.

But you'd have no idea what you'd be walking into.

translation.en: It's not the fucking flu, Usha!

translation.en: Okay? My mom overdosed on heroin.

Look, I gotta get back and deal with all this stuff. Bye.

translation.en: -[Lindsay] J.D.! -Yeah?
[Lindsay] Come here.

Mom, where are my cleats?
Check under your bed, honey. Get me outta here.

What?

Yeah.
[Bev] Is Lindsay around? Not spending all her time with Prince Charming? [chuckles]

I, uh…

I love you.

translation.en: You gotta help me do more cooking and all that healthy stuff, okay?

We're here to visit my son Victor. Victor Boyd.

Hi, sir. Yes?
Hello. I'm J.D. Vance. I'm here to see Sally Coates.

if my mom had somebody to believe in her…

translation.en: All right? This is my family.
So until you drag me out of here, I'm gonna keep giving you reasons.

Good, Linds.

Okay, put 500 more on this one

translation.en: Sorry about this.
[receptionist] Last one.
Okay, you're good.
-Are you serious? -I am! [chuckles]
Okay, perfect. Thank you.
That's done.
Amazing. I'll come back and sign those.
-I'll let my mom know what's going on. -Yes, sir.

Once the doctor and the therapist do their assessment of you.

I changed my mind.
-Where are you going? -What?
-I begged them to let you stay here. -Nobody asked you to.

-Leave her out of this! -You did the same thing to Mamaw.

Do you actually want to be dead? Or you just too lazy to try?

She was worse to you than anybody. Now she's making you feel guilty.

I can't defend her…

You should bring her here.

you know, month.

You sure you don't wanna stay here?
-I got you the bed. -Oh, no.
Just take me to Ray's.
-Mom, come on. -Oh, you know me.

Congratulate me, why don't you? I'm a married woman.

I got married. [laughs]
Well?

Over here.

Wanna get high?

[J.D.] I gotta go.
-Maybe next time. -Pussy!
-[Bev] J.D., I've been looking for you. -[door closes]

Mamaw's got 100 prescriptions in hers, so--
Why isn't yours clean?

-Why isn't yours clean? -Come on now. Go do it!
-No! -Please!

-You should've thought of that before. -I know. I really need this.

translation.de: Und meine Familie schrieb mir jeden Tag.

translation.en: Mamaw's letters were just the greatest.
She would go from, "Jesus walks with you, J.D. Stay strong.
translation.de: Sie schrieb Sachen wie "Jesus hilft dir. Bleib stark.

translation.en: Don't forget that." To, uh… [laughs]
"I wish I had a gun so I could shoot that dickhead drill sergeant of yours."
translation.de: …"Hätte ich ein Gewehr, würde ich deinen blöden Ausbilder erschießen."

translation.en: [J.D.] My grandparents just left everything they knew behind
translation.de: Meine Großeltern ließen alles zurück, was sie kannten,

translation.en: and started over with what they could fit in Papaw's truck.
translation.de: und fingen neu an mit dem, was in Papaws Wagen passte.

translation.en: Yeah.
That's… that's like my dad.
He came here with nothing.
translation.de: Er kam hier mit nichts an.

translation.en: He had to just find his way.
translation.de: Er musste sich seinen Weg suchen.

translation.en: I think that's what kills me the most about Mamaw.
translation.de: Was ich gegenüber Mamaw wohl am meisten bereue…

translation.en: I never got to tell people, uh…
just how much she meant to me.
She'd been sick a long time,
but when it happened, I couldn't…
translation.de: aber als es passierte, war ich…

translation.en: [voice breaks] Yeah, I couldn't, like, believe she was actually gone.
translation.de: Ich konnte nicht glauben, dass sie tot war.

translation.en: Wish I could have met her.
translation.de: Ich wünschte, ich hätte sie gekannt.

translation.en: Yeah, me, too.
[chuckles] Yeah.
Where are you now?
I had to get off I-95 because the traffic was so bad.
translation.de: Ich musste runter von der I-95, weil zu viel Stau war.

translation.en: I'm on some side street. I'll be there in about an hour.
translation.de: Ich bin auf Nebenstraßen. In einer Stunde bin ich da.

translation.en: An hour?
-You're not gonna make it. -I know.
I don't know what to do, Usha.
Can you go down there and tell him I'm on my way, please?
translation.de: Kannst du hinfahren und sagen, dass ich komme?

translation.en: Yeah, yes, I can do that.
translation.de: Ja, klar, das kann ich machen.

translation.en: Okay, I'll call you right back.
Okay? It's gonna be fine. Drive safe.
[J.D.] Twice I've needed to be rescued.
The first time it was Mamaw who saved me.
translation.de: Das erste Mal rettete mich Mamaw.

translation.en: [woman] J.D. Vance?
Yeah.
[J.D.] The second, it was what she taught me.
translation.de: Das zweite Mal das, was sie mich lehrte.

translation.en: That where we come from is who we are,
translation.de: Unsere Herkunft sagt, wer wir sind,

translation.en: but we choose every day who we become.
translation.de: aber wir entscheiden jeden Tag, wer wir werden.

translation.en: My family's not perfect, but they made me who I am
translation.de: Meine Familie ist nicht perfekt, aber sie gaben mir mein Leben und Chancen, die sie nie hatten.

translation.en: and gave me chances that they never had.
translation.de: aber sie gaben mir mein Leben und Chancen, die sie nie hatten.

translation.en: My future, whatever it is, is our shared legacy.
translation.de: Meine Zukunft, wie sie auch aussehen mag, ist unser gemeinsames Erbe.

translation.en: Good to see you again.
Thank you.
I'm glad to be here.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, hier zu sein.
